lead_paragraph: After three disappointing finishes to start the 2007 season, Phil Mickelson earned his 30th career PGA Tour victory Sunday, winning the Pebble Beach National Pro-Am by five shots.
snippet: After three disappointing finishes to start the 2007 season, Phil Mickelson earned his 30th career PGA Tour victory Sunday, winning the Pebble Beach National Pro-Am by five shots.
